title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description:
Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: The dialog details have several issues:
i. The duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page.
ii. The first and second columns could be merged.

OB: None mentioned

EB: The following issues need to be addressed:
a. The marking between the button and list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top.
b. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic.
c. Multiple selection should be allowed, as move up / down can be applied on more than one item.
d. The signature preview must be a label that wraps.
e. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover.

SR: To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps:
f. Change the parameter name to something very long and observe that the preview is cut off.
